properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @author Erwan Taloc <erwan.taloc@combodo.com> * @author Romain Quetiez <romain.quetiez@combodo.com> * @author Denis Flaven <denis.flaven@combodo.com> * @license http://www.opensource.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html LGPL */

field.name: requestor_id
field.filter: SELECT Person AS p WHERE p.org_id = :this->org_id

field.name: agent_id
field.filter: SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkTeamToContact AS l ON l.contact_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->workgroup_id

field.name: supervisor_id
field.filter: SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkTeamToContact AS l ON l.contact_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->supervisor_group_id

field.name: manager_id
field.filter: SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkTeamToContact AS l ON l.contact_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->manager_group_id
